result.eng: They should close every single window in the house.
result.ga: Ba chóir dóibh gach uile fhuinneog sa teach a dhúnadh
result.orig: Ba chóir dóibh gach uile fhuinneog sa teach a dhúnadh
result.html: Ba chóir dóibh gach uile fhuinneog sa teach a dhúnadhThey should close every single window in the house.
result.ponchtml: Ba ċóir dóiḃ gaċ uile ḟuinneog sa teaċ a ḋúnaḋThey should close every single window in the house.

result.eng: Click here to close the window.
result.ga: Cliceáil anseo chun an fhuinneog a dhúnadh
result.orig: Cliceáil anseo chun an fhuinneog a dhúnadh
result.html: Cliceáil anseo chun an fhuinneog a dhúnadhClick here to close the window.
result.ponchtml: Cliceáil anseo ċun an ḟuinneog a ḋúnaḋClick here to close the window.

result.html: Is dlúthchairde muidWe are close friends.
result.ponchtml: Is dlúṫċairde muidWe are close friends.

result.html: Druid an dorasClose the door!
result.ponchtml: Druid an dorasClose the door!

result.eng: We'll close the shop if necessary.
result.ga: Dúnfaidh muid an siopa más gá
result.orig: Dúnfaidh muid an siopa más gá
result.html: Dúnfaidh muid an siopa más gáWe'll close the shop if necessary.
result.ponchtml: Dúnfaiḋ muid an siopa más gáWe'll close the shop if necessary.

result.eng: We are very close to the border.
result.html: Tá muid an-ghar don teorainnWe are very close to the border.
result.ponchtml: Tá muid an-ġar don teorainnWe are very close to the border.

result.eng: I need to close the door.

result.html: Caithfidh mé an doras a dhúnadhI need to close the door.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ mé an doras a ḋúnaḋI need to close the door.

result.eng: I am not able to close the door.

result.html: Níl mé in ann an doras a dhúnadhI am not able to close the door.

result.ga: Dún an fhuinneog le do thoil

result.html: Dún an fhuinneog le do thoilClose the window, please.
result.ponchtml: Dún an ḟuinneog le do ṫoilClose the window, please.

result.eng: Are you and your brother very close?
result.ga: An bhfuil tú féin agus do dheartháir an-mhór le chéile
result.orig: An bhfuil tú féin agus do dheartháir an-mhór le chéile
result.html: An bhfuil tú féin agus do dheartháir an-mhór le chéileAre you and your brother very close?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil tú féin agus do ḋearṫáir an-ṁór le ċéileAre you and your brother very close?

result.eng: It's beside the sea but close to the city as well.
result.ga: Tá sé cois farraige ach gar don chathair freisin
result.orig: Tá sé cois farraige ach gar don chathair freisin
result.html: Tá sé cois farraige ach gar don chathair freisinIt's beside the sea but close to the city as well.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé cois farraige aċ gar don ċaṫair freisinIt's beside the sea but close to the city as well.

result.eng: I live in a small house, close to the city centre in Dublin.
result.ga: Tá mé i mo chónaí i dteach beag gar do lár na cathrach i mBaile Átha Cliath
result.orig: Tá mé i mo chónaí i dteach beag gar do lár na cathrach i mBaile Átha Cliath

result.ponchtml: Tá mé i mo ċónaí i dteaċ beag gar do lár na caṫraċ i mBaile Áṫa CliaṫI live in a small house, close to the city centre in Dublin.

result.eng: I have no garden, alas, but there's a big park very close to my house
result.ga: Níl gairdín ar bith agam faraor ach tá páirc mhór an-ghar do mo theach
result.orig: Níl gairdín ar bith agam faraor ach tá páirc mhór an-ghar do mo theach
result.html: Níl gairdín ar bith agam faraor ach tá páirc mhór an-ghar do mo theachI have no garden, alas, but there's a big park very close to my house

result.eng: "Some fool was flying tourists around Manhattan and went to close to the building", I thought.
result.ga: Amadán éigin ag eitilt turasóirí timpeall Manhattan agus a chuaigh róchóngarach don fhoirgneamh a shíleas
result.orig: Amadán éigin ag eitilt turasóirí timpeall Manhattan agus a chuaigh róchóngarach don fhoirgneamh a shíleas
result.html: Amadán éigin ag eitilt turasóirí timpeall Manhattan agus a chuaigh róchóngarach don fhoirgneamh a shíleas"Some fool was flying tourists around Manhattan and went to close to the building", I thought.
result.ponchtml: Amadán éigin ag eitilt turasóirí timpeall Manhattan agus a ċuaiġ róċóngaraċ don ḟoirgneaṁ a ẛíleas"Some fool was flying tourists around Manhattan and went to close to the building", I thought.

result.eng: On my way back from Ireland last month, I had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints.
result.ga: Ar mo bhealach ar ais as Éirinn an mhí seo caite rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorga
result.orig: Ar mo bhealach ar ais as Éirinn an mhí seo caite rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorga
result.html: Ar mo bhealach ar ais as Éirinn an mhí seo caite rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorgaOn my way back from Ireland last month, I had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints.
result.ponchtml: Ar mo ḃealaċ ar ais as Éirinn an ṁí seo caite rinneaḋ scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo ṁéarlorgaOn my way back from Ireland last month, I had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints.

result.eng: I had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints, like every non-American citizen on his way into the country.
result.ga: Rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorga mar a dhéantar le gach éinne nach saoránach Meiriceánach é ar a bhealach isteach sa tír
result.orig: Rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorga mar a dhéantar le gach éinne nach saoránach Meiriceánach é ar a bhealach isteach sa tír
result.html: Rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorga mar a dhéantar le gach éinne nach saoránach Meiriceánach é ar a bhealach isteach sa tírI had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints, like every non-American citizen on his way into the country.
result.ponchtml: Rinneaḋ scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo ṁéarlorga mar a ḋéantar le gaċ éinne naċ saoránaċ Meiriceánaċ é ar a ḃealaċ isteaċ sa tírI had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints, like every non-American citizen on his way into the country.

result.eng: He got close enough to him to talk.
result.ga: Tháinig sé fá fhad cainte dó
result.orig: Tháinig sé fá fhad cainte dó
result.html: Tháinig sé fá fhad cainte dóHe got close enough to him to talk.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig sé fá ḟad cainte dóHe got close enough to him to talk.
